about.title: About – NASA Technical Services
about.heading: About Us
about.text: NASA Technical Services is an engineering firm specializing in industrial burner systems. We provide installation, maintenance, and service solutions all over Turkey.
about.whoDesc: NASA Technical Services delivers high-quality solutions with an engineering team that has years of industry experience. We prioritize customer satisfaction and rapid response.
about.visionDesc: To be a leading, innovative, and reliable solutions partner in industrial burner systems.
about.missionDesc: To provide efficient, eco-friendly, and sustainable services by utilizing the latest technologies.

footer.copy: © 2025 NASA Technical Services. All rights reserved.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about our burner systems and services.

q1.question: How often should I service my burner?
q1.answer: We recommend annual maintenance to keep your burner performing optimally. In heavy usage scenarios, semi-annual check-ups can be scheduled.

q2.question: How do I create a service request?
q2.answer: You can fill out the 'Contact' form on our website or send us your request via our 24/7 WhatsApp line. You will receive a swift response.

q3.question: What should I do in case of an emergency breakdown?
q3.answer: Mark your request as urgent or call +90 531 625 06 94. Our field team will respond as soon as possible.

q4.question: Which regions do you serve?
q4.answer: We serve all over Turkey. We offer rapid field support in Istanbul, Ankara, Izmir, and their surrounding areas.

q5.question: How can I request a price quote?
q5.answer: Click the 'Get a Quote' button and share your requirements. We will send you a detailed quote within 24 hours.

q6.question: Do you provide training or user education?
q6.answer: Yes, we offer certified training services for burner operation and maintenance. Contact us for schedule and curriculum details.

maintenance.pageTitle: Annual Periodic Maintenance - NASA Technical Services
maintenance.subtitle: For maximum safety and efficiency, our expert team performs comprehensive annual maintenance, cleaning, and flue gas analysis.
maintenance.contentDesc: During our annual periodic maintenance, our expert team covers all critical points of your burner system. We prioritize flue gas analysis to ensure optimal performance and safety.

step1.title: Pre-Inspection:
step1.desc: Assessment of current condition by analyzing facility records and previous maintenance reports.

step2.title: Cleaning & Maintenance:
step2.desc: Cleaning burner components, replacing filters and nozzles, and performing mechanical maintenance.

step3.title: Safety Checks:
step3.desc: Testing and verifying safety valves, pressure switches, sensors, and safety systems.

step4.title: Combustion Performance & Flue Gas Analysis:
step4.desc: Optimizing fuel-air settings, conducting emission measurements, and evaluating performance with a flue gas analyzer.

step5.title: Reporting:
step5.desc: Providing a report with performed tasks, measurement results, recommendations, and scheduling the next maintenance.

maintenance.benefit1: Reduced fuel consumption and increased energy efficiency
maintenance.benefit2: Lower emissions through accurate optimization based on flue gas analysis
maintenance.benefit3: Preventing costs and downtime by detecting potential failures early
maintenance.benefit4: Long-term system durability and extended equipment lifespan
maintenance.benefit5: Compliance with current regulations and safety standards
maintenance.quoteText1: To receive a service fee estimate and detailed quote, please visit our
maintenance.quoteText2: page and get in touch with us. Our professional team will respond promptly.

installation.pageTitle: Industrial Burner Installation - NASA Technical Services
installation.subtitle: Professional burner installation service for efficient and safe combustion systems.
installation.contentDesc: At NASA Technical Services, we install burner systems in industrial facilities to ensure high safety and energy efficiency. The process begins with a site survey and completes with proper burner assembly and commissioning.

step1.title: Burner Selection:
step1.desc: Determining the appropriate burner based on fuel type, capacity, and facility layout.

step2.title: Site Survey:
step2.desc: Inspecting the installation area and identifying necessary preparations.

step3.title: Assembly:
step3.desc: Mechanical installation, electrical connections, and system integration.

step4.title: Commissioning:
step4.desc: Initial ignition, combustion tuning, and safety system checks.

step5.title: Training:
step5.desc: Training the end-user on correct operation and maintenance procedures.

installation.benefit1: High energy efficiency and fuel savings
installation.benefit2: Compliance with standards and long-lasting performance
installation.benefit3: Safe design that minimizes breakdown risks
installation.quoteText1: For detailed information about our custom burner installation service, please visit our
installation.quoteText2: page and get in touch with us.

automation.pageTitle: Automation & Control Systems - NASA Technical Services
automation.subtitle: Increase your production efficiency with modern automation solutions that optimize industrial processes.
automation.contentDesc: At NASA Technical Services, we develop intelligent automation solutions to enhance production, safety, and energy efficiency in industrial facilities. By integrating PLC, HMI, and SCADA systems, we make your processes remotely monitorable and controllable.

step1.title: Survey:
step1.desc: Analysis of existing system and identifying requirements.

step3.title: Installation:
step3.desc: Hardware assembly, wiring, and system configuration.

step4.title: Software & Testing:
step4.desc: PLC programming, SCADA screen design and commissioning tests.

step5.title: Documentation & Training:
step5.desc: Providing user training and technical documentation.

automation.benefit2: Early detection of faults and rapid intervention
automation.quoteText1: For tailored automation solutions for your facility, please visit our
automation.quoteText2: page and get in touch with us.

energy.subtitle: We maximize energy savings by analyzing your systems.
energy.contentDesc: Our expert team conducts a comprehensive energy audit of your facility; based on the collected data, we develop efficiency analyses and optimization plans.

step1.title: Energy Audit:
step1.desc: Measuring and reporting your facility’s energy consumption profiles.

step2.title: Efficiency Analysis:
step2.desc: Evaluating system performance and efficiency based on collected data.

step3.title: Optimization:
step3.desc: Improvement recommendations, equipment upgrades, and software adjustments.

step4.title: Investment Review:
step4.desc: Conducting cost-benefit analyses and ROI timelines for proposed investments.

step5.title: Training & Implementation:
step5.desc: Training staff and applying recommended actions on-site.

energy.quoteText1: For an energy efficiency audit report and quote, please visit our
energy.quoteText2: page. Our experts will get back to you promptly.

spares.pageTitle: Spare Parts Supply - NASA Technical Services
spares.subtitle: We guarantee uninterrupted operation with original parts.
spares.contentDesc: With our extensive spare-parts network, we quickly procure original equipment parts to ensure your production never stops.

step1.title: Part Identification:
step1.desc: Determining required spare parts by model and serial number.

step2.title: Stock Check:
step2.desc: Reviewing stock levels and alternative procurement channels.

step3.title: Ordering & Logistics:
step3.desc: Fast ordering process and secure logistics coordination.

step4.title: Delivery:
step4.desc: Coordinating delivery to site or warehouse.

step5.title: Technical Support:
step5.desc: Consulting on part installation and compatibility.

duoblok.metaKeywords: Duoblok Burner, Modular Burner, Industrial Burner, High Capacity Burner
duoblok.name: Duoblok Burner
duoblok.desc: Modular structure, high capacity, and efficient combustion control.
duoblok.overviewDesc: Duoblok Burner meets high-capacity combustion needs and simplifies maintenance with its dual-block structure. Each block can operate independently; if one goes out of service, the other continues, ensuring uninterrupted production.
duoblok.spec2: Fuel Type: Natural Gas / LPG / Fuel Oil
duoblok.benefit1: Continued operation of the other block even in the event of failure
duoblok.benefit2: High capacity adjustment for energy efficiency
duoblok.benefit3: Easy maintenance and fast spare part supply

monoblok.metaKeywords: Monoblok Burner, Industrial Burner, Compact Burner, Technical Burner
monoblok.name: Monoblok Burner
monoblok.desc: Compact design, all components in a single body.
monoblok.feature1: All components in a single enclosure
monoblok.overviewDesc: The Monoblok Burner is designed to provide high-efficiency combustion solutions for industrial facilities. Thanks to its specially coated ceramic combustion chamber and integrated control panel, it delivers maximum performance. Its compact structure makes it ideal for both small and medium-sized boilers.
monoblok.benefit1: Low fuel consumption and eco-friendly emissions
monoblok.benefit3: Easy control with integrated automation system

product33.pageTitle: Safety Shut-Off Valve | NASA Technical Services
product33.metaDescription: Safety Shut-Off Valve: High-speed, reliable valve solution that cuts off gas flow in emergencies to ensure facility safety. Technical data, features, and application areas in detail.
product33.metaKeywords: Safety Shut-Off Valve, Gas Safety Valve, Flame Safety, Industrial Safety Valve, NASA Technical
product33.metaOgDescription: Safety Shut-Off Valve: High-speed, reliable valve solution that cuts off gas flow in emergencies.
product33.heroSubtitle: A fast-acting safety valve solution that ensures your facility’s safety by shutting off gas flow instantly in emergencies.
product33.productDescription: The Safety Shut-Off Valve immediately cuts off gas flow in cases such as flashback, pressure surges, or system faults in gas systems, preventing fire and explosion risks. Its high-speed electric/pneumatic actuator ensures closing within milliseconds.
product33.featureFastClose: Fast Closing Time: Fast safety with response time up to 15 ms.
product33.featureDurable: High Durability: Stainless steel body resistant to working pressure up to 16 bar.
product33.featureActuator: Reliable Actuator: Electric (24V DC / 220V AC) or pneumatic options.
product33.featureStandard: Standard Compliance: Meets EN 161 and ISO 23551-1 standards.
product33.featureEasyInstall: Easy Installation: Flanged or threaded connection options.
product33.featureSafety: Exceptional Safety: Thermal overload protection and manual hand release mechanism.
product33.usageGasLine: Natural gas and LPG fuel lines
product33.usageHVAC: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems

product44.metaDescription: Combustion Analyzer: A modern analysis device that maximizes combustion efficiency with O₂/CO measurement. Technical data, features, and application areas in detail.
product44.metaKeywords: Combustion Analyzer, Oxygen Analysis, Carbon Monoxide Measurement, Efficiency, NASA Technical Services
product44.metaOgDescription: Combustion Analyzer: A modern analysis device that maximizes combustion efficiency with O₂/CO measurement.
product44.heroSubtitle: An advanced technology device that precisely measures oxygen (O₂) and carbon monoxide (CO) values to maximize your combustion efficiency.
product44.productDescription: The Combustion Analyzer provides real-time oxygen and carbon monoxide data to optimize combustion processes in industrial boilers, furnaces, and burner systems. With its touch-screen interface and integrated data logging feature, it enables energy efficiency analyses by recording process data.
product44.featureDualGas: Dual Gas Measurement: Simultaneous data collection with O₂ and CO sensors.
product44.featureTouchScreen: Touch TFT Display: Easy-to-read graphical interface and parameter settings.
product44.featureSoftware: Integrated Analysis Software: Data logging, reporting, and PC integration.
product44.featureFastResponse: Fast Response Time: 2-second response speed for real-time monitoring.
product44.featureWideRange: Wide Range: 0–25% O₂ and 0–5000 ppm CO measurement range.
product44.featureDurable: Durable Construction: IP65 protection rating, suitable for harsh industrial environments.
product44.featureEasyMaintenance: Easy Maintenance: Modular sensor replacement kit for quick field service.
product44.usageBoiler: Optimization of combustion efficiency in boiler and furnace processes
product44.usageWasteHeat: Waste heat recovery and power plants
product44.usageChemical: Chemical plants and sustainable energy applications
